label: FinancingSummaryDocument
comment: A collection of financing related data that provides an overview of key points.

datatypeProperties.comment: The financed applied rate, expressed as a percentage, in this financing summary document.

objectProperties.comment: An original total monetary value of accepted transactions in this financing summary document.
A financed total monetary value in this financing summary document.
The number of financed transactions specified in this financing summary document.
The financing financial account, used for managing the line of credit, specified for this financing summary document.
The financial booking related to this financing summary document.
A creditor financial account specified for this trade settlement payment means.
